validationRule.errorMessage: You can't enter more than 255 characters.
You can't enter more than 40 characters.
You can't enter more than 80 characters.

fields.name: Engagement_Name_Com
fields.helpText: When creating a new engagement, it must meet the following naming convention: RCE: <Insert descriptive name> - <Year>. An example is: RCE: Textiles Commercialisation - 2023.

validationRule.errorMessage: You can't enter more than 80 characters.

fields.name: Engagement_Name_RP
fields.helpText: When creating a new engagement, it must meet the following naming convention: RPE: <Insert descriptive name> - <Year>. An example is: RPE: Textile Waste Management Research - 2023.

validationRule.errorMessage: You can't enter more than 80 characters.

fields.name: Engagement_Summary
fields.helpText: A summary/description of the Engagement being undertaken.

validationRule.errorMessage: You can't enter more than 500 characters.

fields.name: ContactMatchError
fields.fieldText: Contact with these details already exists. Please search for the contact with provided details.

fields.name: ErrorNoAccessGeneral
fields.fieldText: Please be advised that you do not have permission to create new engagements using this button. If you have any concerns, please contact your administrator.

fields.name: Select_a_Record_Type
fields.helpText:
Commercialisation


  • Create Commercialisation Engagement to identify and assess research before its ready for commercialisation.


Research Partnership


  • Create Research Partnership Engagement to identify new opportunities with industry partners to support research and research training initiatives.
